item.description: I’ll keep open questions that I have here. How can we learn things the way we learn languages? With languages, it seems that fluency comes from repeated exposure and immersion which leads to natural comfort rather than memorization of phrases.

item.title: Writing is Thinking
item.description: I find it really hard to capture my thoughts meaningfully in writing. Talking usually feels natural, but something about writing feels so much harder.
